title: Woman Standing
description:
A person standing upright. Commonly used to convey awkwardness, particularly on TikTok.

Similar in appearance to üö∂‍‚ôÄÔ∏è Woman Walking, but shown facing forward and without any motion implied.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman standing emoji features a figure rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and glossy 3D shading, conveying a sense of presence and confidence. Her form is depicted with soft rounded edges, and the realistic lighting emphasizes her upright posture, suggesting attentiveness or readiness. This emoji, often used to represent women in various contexts, from personal anecdotes to professional roles, embodies a simple yet powerful visual statement of individuality and action within Apple's design language.
